question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off then move forward towards the tall building then turn left and move forward. move forward until it get closer to the building then turn left and look up then fly higher and forward then turn left. move forward and fly lower between the buildings then move forward until it get closer to the building fly lower then turn left. turn right and move forward towards the building until it get closer to the advertisement board then turn left. turn right and move forward to get closer to the building then turn right and fly higher and move forward towards the corner building along the road then turn right. move forward until it get closer to the building then turn left and fly lower towards the ground then turn left and move forward towards the tree then fly lower to the ground then turn right. turn right and turn left then look around the place then look up to focus the car advertisement board in the building.]. You move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I turn right, fly higher, and head towards the corner building along the road.  
B. I fly low to the ground and turn right.  
C. I turn right and walk forward, approaching the building.  
D. I take off and walk forward towards the tall building.  
E. I turn left and head towards the tree.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current view shows a perspective moving towards a tree, which aligns with the instruction "turn left and move forward towards the tree then fly lower to the ground then turn right." This indicates that the agent is in the phase of the navigation where it is approaching the tree as described in the instructions.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(50, 56)]
Option: E
Reason: The video shows the agent moving towards a tree. The instruction "turn left and move forward towards the tree then fly lower to the ground then turn right" indicates that the agent is approaching the tree.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current view shows a perspective moving towards a tree, which aligns with the instruction "turn left and move forward towards the tree then fly lower to the ground then turn right." This indicates that the agent is in the phase of the navigation where it is approaching the tree as described in the instructions.
